prop.name: targetDescription
prop.desc: The description of a node in an established educational framework.

prop.name: alignmentType
prop.desc: A category of alignment between the learning resource and the framework node. Recommended values include: 'assesses', 'teaches', 'requires', 'textComplexity', 'readingLevel', 'educationalSubject', and 'educationalLevel'.

prop.name: targetUrl
prop.desc: The URL of a node in an established educational framework.

prop.name: targetName
prop.desc: The name of a node in an established educational framework.

prop.name: educationalFramework
prop.desc: The framework to which the resource being described is aligned.
